sourcesContent:
<template>
  <the-header @name="show"></the-header>
  <the-message v-if="showed === 'ak'"></the-message>
  <the-about v-if="showed === 'about'"></the-about>
  <the-work></the-work>


</template>

<script>
import TheHeader from './components/TheHeader.vue';
import TheMessage from './components/TheMessage.vue';
import TheAbout from './components/TheAbout.vue';
import TheWork from './components/TheWork.vue';


export default {
  data() {
    return {
      showed: '',
      
      
    }
  }, methods: {
    show(value) {
      this.showed = value;
      console.log(this.showed)
    },
    open(val) {
      if(this.currentPoint === val){
        this.isOpen = false;
        this.currentPoint = 9;
      } else {
      this.currentPoint = val,
      this.isOpen = true;
      console.log(val);
      }
    }

  },
  created() {
    
  },
 components: {
  TheHeader, TheMessage, TheAbout, TheWork
 }
}
</script>

<style lang=" scss">


    </style>
